#summary Placeholder for Developer's Guide: TBS frame page

= Introduction =
The TBS applet is accessed through a perl-generated frame page which uses javascript to load student data from a database to the applet. This is necessary due to security restrictions on applets, which prohibit communication into or out of the jar while the applet is running. 

Students log in using a perl-generated drop-down menu. more to come.
